> **Source Link:** https://www.tiktok.com/@ironshearss/video/7043647604864847110?lang=en&is_copy_url=1&is_from_webapp=v1
> **Derivative of:** SCP-3355 by djkaktus
[[/<]]
-----
 I heard it was djkaktus's birthday so I posted a day early this week! Yay! I was already planning on doing this article before I found out so I wanted to make it a little more present-y rather than just my usual stuff so I put a little cactus in there for ya. I don't know you but I do like making people happy :)

I really like this article. I love the pessimistic AI that subverts the tropes associated with pessimistic AIs and does something wholesome instead. It's very sweet and I love it. 

Also, I switched to APNGs to preserve the color quality better so if it's not animating click [https://i.imgur.com/hz7FjFr.gif here] to see a gif(or just check out the videos for the higher res animation). 

But yeah! Happy birthday!

+ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:art-mycotherapy More Art Mycotherapy]
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
author: IronShears
